abstract: bkd wealth advisors llc invests $ 310,000 in claymore exchange-traded fund trust .
article: bkd wealth advisors llc bought a new position in shares of claymore exchange-traded fund trust during the 4th quarter , holdingschannel reports . the firm bought 14,565 shares of the company 's stock , valued at approximately $ 310,000 . several other hedge funds have also made changes to their positions in the company . creative planning bought a new position in claymore exchange-traded fund trust in the fourth quarter valued at about $ 279,000 . bergankdv wealth management llc boosted its holdings in claymore exchange-traded fund trust by 9.0 % in the fourth quarter . bergankdv wealth management llc now owns 1,039,235 shares of the company 's stock valued at $ 22,125,000 after acquiring an additional 85,552 shares during the last quarter .

legacy private trust co. . boosted its holdings in claymore exchange-traded fund trust by 6.9 % in the fourth quarter . legacy private trust co. . now owns 66,782 shares of the company 's stock valued at $ 1,422,000 after acquiring an additional 4,301 shares during the last quarter . cmh wealth management llc bought a new position in claymore exchange-traded fund trust in the fourth quarter valued at about $ 1,174,000 . finally , leicht financial planning & wealth management inc. . bought a new position in claymore exchange-traded fund trust in the fourth quarter valued at about $ 334,000 .

claymore exchange-traded fund trust opened at $ 21.23 on friday . claymore exchange-traded fund trust has a 1-year low of $ 21.21 and a 1-year high of $ 21.60 . the company also recently declared a special dividend , which was paid on tuesday , january 2nd . investors of record on friday , december 29th were issued a $ 0.0067 dividend . this represents a yield of 2.59 % . the ex-dividend date of this dividend was thursday , december 28th . warning : this report was first posted by watch list news and is owned by of watch list news .
